Home » Shop » 2013 X-STAR

2013 X-STAR

The best seller in our X Series effortlessly delivers world class wakes with its proven hull, the most rooted V of any twenty two footer. A massive twin-tip bow and ample main lounge holds sixteen of your friends.

$12,888.00

Add to Cart
  • Feature
  • Spec
  • Images
  • Reviews

COMMAND CENTER

Triple touchscreen interface featuring a center-mounted Murphy 7-inch and dual 4.3-inch screens providing the driver access and control to the entire boat. Complexity, simplified.



AFT LOUNGE

very stitch and sculpted groove has been thoughtfully redesigned for maximum enjoyment and ease of use. Breathtaking and efficient.



GUNWALE STEP

The new gunwale step is non-skid and just one of dozens of rider-inspired details. Easy in, easy out.



TRANSOM STORAGE

At twenty four feet long, the X-Star is nearly two feet longer than its predecessor. The new hull delivers incredible wakes, but also enables massive storage. The seats and transom tilt open to hold all your tournament gear.



JUDGES CHAIR

he two-way seat makes it easy to reconfigure the X-Star to suit your needs: A bow-passengers back rest, or a transom facing post.
